name: RockFriend
description:
First Godot Project! Was a great way to learn it!!! You can play it on your browser or download the executable for the full screen experience!

How to play:

  • Move with the arrow keys
  • Press z to jump
  • Press x to attack (only when you have the club)
  • Press c to pick-up or drop the club and the rock
  • Get the rock to the grass, sand an water to satisfy its needs!

All assets by me except the song, which is from SawSquareNoise obtained from FMA
